entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Native AOT needs a manifest of input assemblies #108036
    10.0.0
  • System.Data.OleDB Error Messages not working on Spanish #108035
  • ILC is hitting a NullReferenceException when processing linker XML from an assembly #108031
  • [PERF] Issues missed by auto-filer #108027
  • Unhandled exception from AcceptCompletionCallback #108026
  • Docs for members in DependencyInjection.Abstractions lack exception information. #108024
    10.0.0
  • createdump fails on RHEL 8/arm64 with "stack smashing detected" #108023
    10.0.0
  • [wasi] AOT broken in llvm 19 #108020
    10.0.0
  • `GetAsync_ServerNeedsAuthAndNoCredential_StatusCodeUnauthorized` got cancelled #108019
  • [8.0] OOM occurs when calling Encoding.UTF8.GetString with a modified LOH threshold #108010
  • Direct P/Invoke does not seem to work when "encapsulated" in a library #108009
  • `dotnet test` shouldn't crash, even if Dispose method is throwing exception during the Finalize method #108008
  • [9.0] Dead lettering in System.Collections.Specialized.Tests #108007
    9.0.0
  • [9.0] Strings differ assert in System.Text.Tests.EncodingExtensionsTests.Convert_Decoder_ReadOnlySpan_IBufferWriter #108005
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Possible deadlock on process exit if GC is in progress #107800
    8.0.x
  • Plan to migrate to zlib-ng #101465
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 9/5/2024 6:12:12 PM #107623
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8PropertyName API #107782
    10.0.0
  • JIT bit test is not recognized for pattern matching syntax #107801
    10.0.0
  • dotnet --info shows "commi: static" in the host section #108004
  • Performance regression with JsonObject creation by +70% #107869
    9.0.0
  • Serializing source-generated nullable init-only properties throws when using RespectNullableAnnotations #107968
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Call native BrotliEncoderMaxCompressedSize method for BrotliEncoder.GetMaxCompressedLength #108043
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Run our CI source-build legs on CentOS Stream 9 #108042
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable codeql on official builds #108041
    needs-area-label
  • Improve OOM kill message #108039
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [PERF] Fix the perf r2rRunType and pgoRunType argument formats for new flow #108038
    area-Infrastructure
  • Number creation without sign propagation #108037
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix typo `ConcatinatedString ` -> `ConcatenatedString` #108033
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • MSFT:53847109 [.NET Core] DTS / UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups returns PrincipalOperationException: Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212). #108032
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Warn on instrumenting unsupported types for the Fuzzer #108030
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Address failures for Import_IterationCountLimitExceeded_ThrowsInAllottedTime #108028
    area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0-rc2] [browser] Fix custom icu fingerprinting. #108025
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix typo #108022
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Correct JsonPolymorphicAttribute.TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName documentation spelling #108021
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Remove duplicate code in `DiagnosticsHandler` #108012
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #108006
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 9.0.0
  • JIT: run a late pass of empty try/finally/fault removal #108003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Update area owners for System.Data.SqlClient #108040
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Don't expand virtual calls too early for minopts #108002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8PropertyName API and corresponding JsonProperty tests. #107784
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Extend jump tables #107831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix a possible infinite wait for GC completion at process shutdown. #107844
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.11
  • GC test cleanup #107000
    test-enhancement, area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix Random.GetItems breaking change in produced sequence #108017
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107091
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "Avoid taking lock for empty bucket in ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove …" #107656
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. (#107613) #107687
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.10
  • [browser] Fix custom icu fingerprinting. #108011
    area-System.Globalization
  • [release/9.0] Fix SG nullability annotations for required and init properties. #108013
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Mitigate JsonObject performance regression. #108014
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Fix Random.GetItems breaking change in produced sequence #108018
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix compilation on ARM64 hosts #107921
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.11
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Mitigate JsonObject performance regression. #107944
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Fix SG nullability annotations for required and init properties. #107985
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Update configure.h.in #107955
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Replace VectorXx.Exp's edge case fallback with scalar processing #107942
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #107928
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] Remove invalid assert in RSAOpenSsl #107952
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Enable GC double reporting detection #107986
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix reporting illegal instruction exception #107414
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Visit blocks in RPO during LSRA #107927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [workload] Fix the SDK band version and base the WBT on the sdk flow #107899
    needs-area-label
  • Improve Random{NumberGenerator}.GetItems/String for non-power of 2 choices #107988
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [Profiler] Update GetFunctionInfo2 to have a decent default ClassID #107753
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add missing params to WhenEach overloads #107964
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: Fix `emitter::emitSplit` to not create zero-sized method fragment #107568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Enumerable.Reverse(TSource[]) #107957
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #107592
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #107591
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/9.0] Treat -rtm as stable sdk version band #107997
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, area-Workloads
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement Vector.AddSaturate/SubtractSaturate #107193
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow un-examining in PipeReader.AdvanceTo(...) #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Breakpoints not working when debugging on device #43584
  • Implement XML Linting for .csproj and Related Files #43583
  • Provide sbom-tool tests with a base set of scenarios #43582
  • `dotnet build` ignores Code Quality analysis rule severity settings in `.editorconfig` #43574
  • [NETSDKE2E][workload-sets]With NET9 RC2 SDK installed, Improper log displays during running "dotnet workload restore" in CLI. #43572

Closed

  • Add `--source` for `dotnet tool install` - for specifying the package source url #37716
    9.0.1xx
  • Getting "Access to the path ... is denied" on both Windows and macOS #43573

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #43587
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fixup internal builds for sdk #43581
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make the toolsResolverCache path overridable using an environment variable. Fixes #11432. #43576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report msbuild diagnostics as warnings/errors. #43571
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • T00003 - Insecure temporary file creation methods should not be used #43569
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • T00002 - Insecure temporary file creation methods should not be used #43568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • T00001 - Insecure temporary file creation methods should not be used #43567
    untriaged, Area-Watch

Merged

  • Add runtimeconfig option for DataSet XML serialization #43556
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hot Reload: Handle file deletions correctly #43368
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #43560
    Servicing-approved
  • Merged PR 43013: Subtracting 2 for the web template since September w… #43580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet-format batch replace EndOfLine instead of one by one #43399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add an implicit reference to the Generate SBOM task #43151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix SelfContained build/publish when FrameworkReference with profile is combined with FrameworkReference without profile #43555
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve MSBuildWorkspace diagnostic reporting #75170
  • IDE0130 cannot be disabled in .editorconfig #75169

Closed

  • CSharpSyntaxVisitor not working as expected #75168
  • Clarification/documentation for CS9236 #75166

PullRequests

Created

  • More test allocation improvements #75177
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Update VSExtensibility (legacy assemblies going away from VS) #75174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs #75172
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix NETCOREAPP3_0_OR_NEWER checks #75165
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove ResultId from RelatedDocumentsHandler #75176
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move Ref assemblies forward #75173
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Support for per-file content exclusion in Rename Suggestions #74903
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Adding back code to handle LinePosition values correctly #75175
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Test allocations #75171
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix the OOM error in scripting tests #75163
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unnecessary NETCOREAPP3_1 #75164
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add `Enumerable.Reverse(this T[])` polyfill #75104
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Updated

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #75178
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix the SmartRename button regressions #75134
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Add optional value to dart-lab yml #74953
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use MSBuild globs to determine which file changes are relevant #75139
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP logging #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add LSP handler to test Gladstone integration #75146
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ignore irrelevant exceptions when reporting LSP server NFW #75150
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix null dereference in GetAssemblyReferenceAlias #75094
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove LittleEndian asserts #75159
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix null coalescing operator emit with span conversion #75103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Fix parser regressions of conditional expressions #75075
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Y #57977
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #57970
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_spring #57969
  • application/vnd.foo+json disables problem details #57965
  • `UrlHelper.Content` overload that accepts an `appendVersion` argument #57964
  • Allow OpenAPI's description to be set using Minimal API #57963
  • Blazor two-way binding across more than two components (clarification on this documentation) #57962
    9.0.0
  • Typo in HubConnectionExtensions xml docs #57959
  • Blazor WebAssembly uses the AuthorizationMessageHandler exception #57956

Closed

  • PR merged - please consider contributing some funds to lists.eth #57973
  • Route constraints invoked for paths which do not use the route constraint #57572
  • Perf regression: https #57927
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #57937
  • Perf improvement: json #57957
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #57958
  • Virtualize component Placeholder has no effect #57929
  • `dotnet watch`: No hot reload changes to apply. #57951
  • [Identity] Support generating user tokens outside of web applications #57947
  • Unity DI fails to instantiate EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider in .NET 8 #57694
    Backlog
  • The connection was aborted by the application. At HttpRequestStream.ReadAsyncInternal #57950

PullRequests

Created

  • Check for sentinel value when setting HTTP/3 error code #57976
    Servicing-approved, area-networking
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #57975
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0-rc2] [Blazor] Update `WebAssembly.DevServer` to serve the `Blazor-Environment` header #57974
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Fix: Concurrent request for OpenApi documents #57972
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [Blazor] Update `WebAssembly.DevServer` to serve the `Blazor-Environment` header #57971
    area-blazor
  • Using Interlocked in InputFlowControl and Http2Stream #57968
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57967
    Servicing-consider, area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • [release/8.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57966
    Servicing-consider, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0.x
  • Fix typo in HubConnectionExtensions xml docs #57960
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #57952
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • Quarantine and fix Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #57946
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Quarantine ServerShutsDownGracefullyWhenMaxRequestBufferSizeExceeded #57943
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Make serviceProviderIsService optional in constructor of EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider #57797
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rc.2.24464.3 #57887
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Check for sentinel value when setting HTTP/3 error code #57934
    area-networking
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [TEST] Upload windows event logs #57923
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Better Windows dump-based StackOverflow diagnostics #4944
    10.0.0

Closed

  • CreateCounter can create corruptable counter #4843
    9.0.0
  • Can't analyze dump of arm64ec process #4430
    9.0.0
  • Please document CorGCReferenceType::CorHandleWeakWinRT #4171
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge latest main into release/stable #4949
  • Metric name disambiguation #4938
  • codeQL issues #4948
  • Update alias for `dumplocks` command #4947
    9.0.0
  • Add IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_ARM64X and IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_ARM64EC #2858

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add the BindingContext property to the Window TitleBar and inherit its value from the Window's BindingContext #24831

Closed

  • Shell Title View Set at Shell.Xaml.cs is visible in alternative flyout items #10587
  • DisplayAlert not displaying in override void onAppearing #24832
  • Flyout Page: iOS version doesn't have a native hamburger icon for the flout menu #15258
    Backlog
  • Android dynamic theme change not working without styles.xaml file #15359
    Backlog
  • Proposal for Enhanced Splash Screen Functionality in MAUI for iOS #15637
    Backlog
  • [Unstable][MAUI][NET8]Recipe names are truncated on recipe pages #24735
    .NET 8 SR9
  • iOS Buttons without enough padding are truncated in certain scenarios #24746
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Epic: Add new SetBinding API for defining "compiled" bindings in code #22384
    9.0-rc2
  • Task ‘build’ not found after upgrading to macOS Sequoia when trying to debug .NET MAUI project in VS Code. #24827
  • Controls slide up when using the keyboard in iOS #22715
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [iOS] Editor does not scroll when cursor goes behind keyboard #20631
    Backlog
  • Picker to Entry selections causes keyboard to cover low inputs #24496
  • [regression/8.0.3] Keyboard regression bugs #19214
    .NET 8 SR9
  • iOS: CollectionView Crashes when clearing ObservableCollection & adding data second time onwards #22949

PullRequests

Created

  • Batch iOS SetNeedsLayout #24834
    community ✨
  • [macios] Bump .NET 8 to support Xcode 16.0 #24833
  • [Android] CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24826
    community ✨

Merged

  • Add newer cmd linetools paths to cake #24828
  • Add Padding for iOS Buttons in some scenarios #24760
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr9] Add Padding for iOS Buttons in some scenarios #24829
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard

Updated

  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Setting Background to null will update rendering on Android and iOS #24726
    area-theme
  • Adds a rendering performance test #24762
    area-layout, area-testing, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #24817
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Android Ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc.2` #24665
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Fixed NavigationPage Title property #24781
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Custom font icon is not rendered in a shell tabbar tab #24721
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SaveChangesAsync is slow due to cascade delete #34718
    Backlog
  • Cosmos: consider warning/error when attempting to save and a partition key is unset #34716
  • Apostrophe symbol in SQL Server column description is scaffolded as ' #34714
    Backlog
  • Support ExecuteUpdate/Delete with view mapping where the column name differs between the table and view #34713
    Backlog

Closed

  • How to map a view derived from a table, including fk #34694
  • How to handle "The entry point exited without ever building an IHost" #34715
  • DbCommandInterceptors receives obsolete Command Source #34678
  • ExecuteUpdate/Delete attempt to update the view, not the table #34677
    10.0.0
  • How to load ALL items in a lazy collection navigation, when referenced from a child entity? #34622

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34719
  • [release/9.0] Rename IncludeRootDiscriminatorInJsonId to HasRootDiscriminatorInJsonId #34717
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Use the correct comparer when sorting relational functions. #34712
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.0
  • Remove package source mapping and suppress warning #34711
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode
  • Handle view mapping in ExecuteDelete/Update translation #34709

Updated

  • Allow using foreign keys in Dataverse reverse engineering #34689
  • Solves the problem of getting project MSBuild information #34574
